alert.note: Alert for Imperial; Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 22 at 5:24PM PST until December 22 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... North Central Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... Southwestern La Paz County in west central Arizona... Northeastern Imperial County in southeastern California... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 1000 PM MST /900 PM PST/. * At 624 PM MST /524 PM PST/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Quartzsite, Yuma Proving Ground, Kofa Wildlife Refuge, Palm Canyon and Ehrenberg. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
